comment: three-step reaction (see R00730+R04460+R07190, similar to R09578, R09579+R09580+R09581)
definition: L-Tyrosine + 2 Oxygen + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> (E)-4-Hydroxyphenylacetaldehyde oxime + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 3 H2O + CO2
name: L-tyrosine,[reduced NADPH-hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
